title: Mango cheesecake
ingredients: ['Vegetable oil for greasing', '125 g (4½ oz) reduced-fat digestive biscuits', '60 g (2¼ oz) butter', 'For the filling', '75 ml (2½ fl oz) semi-skimmed milk', '10-12 strands saffron, pounded', '500 g (1 lb 2 oz) low-fat Greek yoghurt', '50-60 g (1¾-2¼ oz) caster sugar', 'Finely grated zest of 1 lime', '1 sachet powdered gelatine', 'For the topping', '850 g (1 lb 14 oz) canned mango slices in syrup', 'Sugar to taste', '½ teaspoon freshly grated nutmeg, or 1 teaspoon ground cardamom', '1 sachet powdered gelatine']
